description: Application for a Non-Material Amendment to Planning Permission ref: 22/02144/HOU (Demolition of existing garage and rear conservatory, erection of single storey side and rear extension. Alteration to roof, erection of rear dormer roof extension with juliet balcony, installation of 1 no front and 1 no side rooflights to facilitate loft conversion). Amendment to proposed rear elevation and proposed second floor.
